div.h3: Welcome to Little Ferry Public Schools

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(51, 51, 153);
span.br: Welcome to our website! We're glad you've stopped by

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(51, 51, 153);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(51, 51, 153);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(51, 51, 153);

div.span: Our goal is to maintain a site that keeps you informed of

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(51, 51, 153);
font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(51, 51, 153);

div.span:
going on in the school district. Try the "Search" box at the top of the pages to find pages and content.
And remember, we are on Facebook

span.span:
LFPS Inspirational Message
to Students and Parents

br.span: Faculty and Staff at the Little Ferry Public Schools came together to send out a special message to all of our students and parents...

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: "Comic Sans MS";
letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); outline: 0px; text-decoration: underline; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

Link to Video Conference Permission Form

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); outline: 0px; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);
letter-spacing: normal; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px;
letter-spacing: normal; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px;

p.style: letter-spacing: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

p.span: I hope this message finds you and your family safe and healthy! In order to try to make Virtual Learning and Distance learning better, we are asking that you take a short, anonymous survey. The purpose of the survey is to get your opinion on how we can better serve our students through this pandemic. Your assistance is greatly appreciated. I have attached the link to this email and will also post it on the School Facebook Page. Please do the survey by Friday, May 1st. Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation.

br.span: We have created dedicated pages for Covid-19 and Distance Learning updates. The link is located at the top of the page.

span.span: dministrative Offices will be open between 8:00am and 2:00pm Weekdays for phone, email contact and deliveries only.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);
text-align: left; font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);
font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

br.span: By order of the Governor all schools are CLOSED. Do not come to the Little Ferry schools for any reason.
Do not endanger yourself or others by traveling unnecessarily.

span.style: font-family: "Comic Sans MS"; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(0, 19, 215);

br.span:
The Little Ferry Public Schools have added to their security by requiring ALL Visitors, Parents, and Guardians to present a photo ID at the Main Entrance in order to gain access to the building or pick up a child.
In order to pick up a child from the nurse, school, or any other office, the parent or guardian must present a photo ID that is validated against our Student Information System. If you do not present a photo ID, we will have to call another contact person in our database to release the child.
We are sorry for any inconvenience, but we are remaining cautious on the side of safety. Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter.
